discussion.content:
Here we are sure it is C cause : 
-we don't have much control on standard report. 
-Data views are avalaible during 6 mounth on the account
-Combine it with SQL queries, it's the best way to integrate it in a DE for a future campaign

Subscriber Engagement report doesn't show the subscriber key, only email address and can't be saved as a target audience without additional steps. 
I think itâ€™s C. Create and execute a SQL Query against the _Click data view

choices.A: Create and execute a Data Filter on the _Click data view.
choices.C: Create and execute a SQL Query against the _Click data view.
choices.D: Create and execute a Tracking Extract.
choices.B: Create and execute a Subscriber Engagement report.

questions.question_text:
A customer wants to create a loyalty program by identifying all subscribers who clicked on a link within any email sent within the last six months.
What should be recommended?

Northern Trail Outfitters wants to suppress their highly engaged email subscribers (multiple opens and clicks for a target campaign) from active display campaigns to reduce overall cost and eliminate unnecessary targeting to the user.
What should be recommended?

Northern Trail Outfitters has acquired a new company and is importing customer data to Marketing Cloud. They want to ensure commercial emails are not sent to email addresses who have previously opted-out.
Which feature should they use?

Northern Trail Outfitters wants to create a query to populate a data extension with email subscribers who belong to a specific Publication List.
Which Data View could they use to achieve this?

discussion.content: I think is _ListSubscribers. In this dataview you can find subscribers on any list, publication list, or suppression list.

C..
In the Marketing Cloud Summer '23 release, there is a new function named BuildRowsetFromJson(1,2,3). It works very similar to BuildRowsetFromXml.

questions.question_text:
Northern Trail Outfitters is using a triggered send to send customers their order confirmations. Their commerce platform provides a JSON payload for order details.
What would they use to format the JSON within the email?

choices.B: ParseJSON content block within Content Builder
